mapper.insert: insert into qrtz_blob_triggers (SCHED_NAME, TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP, BLOB_DATA) values (#{schedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blobData,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.select: select SCHED_NAME, TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP, BLOB_DATA from qrtz_blob_triggers
